# Load Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Load data

```{r}
log2_fold_change <- read.csv(here("data/03_dat_aug_03.csv"))
```

# Heatmap

```{r}
print(log2_fold_change)
```

```{r}

fold_change_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = name, y = code_class, fill = log2_fold_change)) +
  geom_tile() +
  scale_fill_gradient2(
    low = "blue", high = "red", mid = "white", midpoint = 0,
    name = "Mean Log2 Fold Change"
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "Genes", 
    y = NULL
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "black", color = NA),
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),  
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank()  
  )

```

```{r}
fold_change_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = code_class, # set code_class as x-axis
             y = log2_fold_change,  # set log2_fold_change as y-axis
             fill = code_class)) + # color by code_class
   labs(
    x = NULL, 
    y = "log2 Fold Change") +
    scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Paired") +
    geom_boxplot()
```
